meanings: Noun (단단한) 사각형 덩어리 (→breeze block, building block, cinder block)

vlive.korean: 산드라 블록인데! I mean, it's Sandra Bullock! 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 🌙
너무 블록버스터 연출인가? Was it too exaggerated? 듣기 View video Wanna One : 도착했다녤
뽑은 블록은 가지고 있으면 돼요? Should we keep the blocks we picked? 듣기 View video Jellyfish Entertainment : [Full] gugudan SEMINA X EATING SHOW Season 2 - 구구단 세미나 X 같이 먹어요 시즌 2

vlive.korean: 그때 블록으로 아이스크림 만들고 이브이 만들었나? We made ice cream and Eevee with blocks? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 승민이의 소확행🐶
vlive.english: We made ice cream and Eevee with blocks?

vlive.english: [Nano-block making with Aron and JR] I'm done with the rabbit!

examples.korean: The blocks should be laid on a bed of concrete. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 블록들은 콘크리트 바닥 위에 놓아야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The blocks should be laid on a bed of concrete. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We walked uptown a couple of blocks until we found a cab. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 도심을 벗어나 두어 블록쯤 걷다가 택시를 만났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We walked uptown a couple of blocks until we found a cab. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The murder occurred just a block from the precinct. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 살인 사건은 관할 경찰서에서 겨우 한 블록 떨어진 곳에서 발생했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The murder occurred just a block from the precinct. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A book that is shut is but a block. (Thomas Fuller) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 닫혀있기만 한 책은 블록일 뿐이다. (토마스 풀러, 독서명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: A book that is shut is but a block. (Thomas Fuller) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The blockchain records Bitcoin transactions. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 블록체인이 비트코인의 거래 명세를 기록한다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: The blockchain records Bitcoin transactions. Add to Wordbook
